REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0973 reute r f BC-TURKISH-CENTRAL-BANK 04-03 0045

TEXT.TITLE: TURKISH CENTRAL BANK SETS LIRA/DOLLAR, DM RATES
TEXT.BODY: Turkey's Central Bank set a lira/dollar rate for April 6 of 781.95/785.86 to the dollar, up from 782.50/786.41. It set a lira/D-mark rate of 430.15/432.30 to the mark, down from 428.30/430.44. REUTER
